typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	isReported as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		STATE as string,
		YEAR as string,
		POP as string,
		Arrests as string,
		MALE as string,
		FEMALE as string,
		AGE_09 as string,
		M0_9 as string,
		F0_9 as string,
		AGE_10_12 as string,
		M10_12 as string,
		F10_12 as string,
		AGE_13_15 as string,
		M13_15 as string,
		F13_15 as string,
		AGE_16_17 as string,
		M16_17 as string,
		F16_17 as string,
		AGE_18_24 as string,
		M18_24 as string,
		F18_24 as string,
		AGE_25_29 as string,
		M25_29 as string,
		F25_29 as string,
		AGE_30_34 as string,
		M30_34 as string,
		F30_34 as string,
		AGE_35_39 as string,
		M35_39 as string,
		F35_39 as string,
		AGE_40_44 as string,
		M40_44 as string,
		F40_44 as string,
		AGE_45_49 as string,
		M45_49 as string,
		F45_49 as string,
		AGE_50_54 as string,
		M50_54 as string,
		F50_54 as string,
		AGE_55_59 as string,
		M55_59 as string,
		F55_59 as string,
		AGE_60_64 as string,
		M60_64 as string,
		F60_64 as string,
		AGE_65OVER as string,
		M65 as string,
		F65 as string,
		Race as string,
		WHITE as string,
		JW as string,
		AW as string,
		BLACK as string,
		JB as string,
		AB as string,
		ASIAN as string,
		JA as string,
		AA as string,
		NATIVE as string,
		JI as string,
		AI as string,
		{Race.PropReported} as string,
		Ethnicity as string,
		HISPANIC as string,
		JH as string,
		AH as string,
		NON_HISPANIC as string,
		JN as string,
		AN as string,
		{Ethnicity.PropReported} as string,
		POP_TOTAL as string,
		POP_UNDER18 as string,
		POP_OVER18 as string,
		POP_MALE as string,
		POP_FEMALE as string,
		POP_AGE_0_9 as string,
		POP_M0_9 as string,
		POP_F0_9 as string,
		POP_AGE_10_12 as string,
		POP_M10_12 as string,
		POP_F10_12 as string,
		POP_AGE_13_15 as string,
		POP_M13_15 as string,
		POP_F13_15 as string,
		POP_AGE_16_17 as string,
		POP_M16_17 as string,
		POP_F16_17 as string,
		POP_AGE_18_24 as string,
		POP_M18_24 as string,
		POP_F18_24 as string,
		POP_AGE_25_29 as string,
		POP_M25_29 as string,
		POP_F25_29 as string,
		POP_AGE_30_34 as string,
		POP_M30_34 as string,
		POP_F30_34 as string,
		POP_AGE_35_39 as string,
		POP_M35_39 as string,
		POP_F35_39 as string,
		POP_AGE_40_44 as string,
		POP_M40_44 as string,
		POP_F40_44 as string,
		POP_AGE_45_49 as string,
		POP_M45_49 as string,
		POP_F45_49 as string,
		POP_AGE_50_54 as string,
		POP_M50_54 as string,
		POP_F50_54 as string,
		POP_AGE_55_59 as string,
		POP_M55_59 as string,
		POP_F55_59 as string,
		POP_AGE_60_64 as string,
		POP_M60_64 as string,
		POP_F60_64 as string,
		POP_AGE_65_85 as string,
		POP_M65_85 as string,
		POP_F65_85 as string,
		POP_WHITE as string,
		POP_JW as string,
		POP_AW as string,
		POP_BLACK as string,
		POP_JB as string,
		POP_AB as string,
		POP_ASIAN as string,
		POP_JA as string,
		POP_AA as string,
		POP_NATIVE as string,
		POP_JI as string,
		POP_AI as string,
		POP_HISPANIC as string,
		POP_JH as string,
		POP_AH as string,
		POP_NON_HISPANIC as string,
		POP_JN as string,
		POP_AN as string,
		ArrestRate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offenceDataSource
source(output(
		AreaId as integer,
		AreaTypeId as integer,
		RegionId as integer,
		StateId as integer,
		Fips as integer,
		AreaName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AreaData
offenceDataSource filter(YEAR != 'NA' && YEAR != 'na' && STATE != 'NA') ~> RemoveNAData
RemoveNAData derive(YEAR = toInteger(YEAR),
		ALLGENDERS = case(lower(Arrests) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(Arrests) < 0 , -1, toInteger(Arrests))),
		MALE = case(lower(MALE) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(MALE) < 0 , -1, toInteger(MALE))),
		FEMALE = case(lower(FEMALE) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(FEMALE) < 0 , -1, toInteger(FEMALE))),
		AllGenders_0_17 = case(lower(AGE_09) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_09) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_09))) + 
case(lower(AGE_10_12) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_10_12) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_10_12))) + 
case(lower(AGE_13_15) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_13_15) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_13_15))) + 
case(lower(AGE_16_17) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_16_17) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_16_17))),
		Male_0_17 = case(lower(M0_9) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M0_9) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M0_9))) + 
case(lower(M10_12) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M10_12) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M10_12))) + 
case(lower(M13_15) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M13_15) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M13_15))) + 
case(lower(M16_17) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M16_17) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M16_17))),
		Female_0_17 = case(lower(F0_9) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F0_9) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F0_9))) + 
case(lower(F10_12) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F10_12) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F10_12))) + 
case(lower(F13_15) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F13_15) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F13_15))) + 
case(lower(F16_17) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F16_17) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F16_17))),
		AllGenders_18_24 = case(lower(AGE_18_24) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_18_24) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_18_24))),
		Male_18_24 = case(lower(M18_24) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M18_24) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M18_24))),
		Female_18_24 = case(lower(F18_24) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F18_24) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F18_24))),
		AllGenders_25_39 = case(lower(AGE_25_29) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_25_29) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_25_29))) +
case(lower(AGE_30_34) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_30_34) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_30_34))) +
case(lower(AGE_35_39) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_35_39) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_35_39))),
		Male_25_39 = case(lower(M25_29) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M25_29) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M25_29))) +
case(lower(M30_34) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M30_34) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M30_34))) +
case(lower(M35_39) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M35_39) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M35_39))),
		Female_25_39 = case(lower(F25_29) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F25_29) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F25_29))) +
case(lower(F30_34) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F30_34) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F30_34))) +
case(lower(F35_39) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F35_39) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F35_39))),
		AllGenders_40_59 = case(lower(AGE_40_44) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_40_44) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_40_44))) +
case(lower(AGE_45_49) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_45_49) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_45_49))) +
case(lower(AGE_50_54) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_50_54) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_50_54))) +
case(lower(AGE_55_59) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_55_59) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_55_59))),
		Male_40_59 = case(lower(M40_44) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M40_44) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M40_44))) +
case(lower(M45_49) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M45_49) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M45_49))) +
case(lower(M50_54) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M50_54) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M50_54))) +
case(lower(M55_59) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M55_59) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M55_59))),
		Female_40_59 = case(lower(F40_44) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F40_44) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F40_44))) +
case(lower(F45_49) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F45_49) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F45_49))) +
case(lower(F50_54) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F50_54) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F50_54))) +
case(lower(F55_59) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F55_59) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F55_59))),
		AllGenders_60 = case(lower(AGE_60_64) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_60_64) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_60_64))) +
case(lower(AGE_65OVER) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AGE_65OVER) < 0 , 0, toInteger(AGE_65OVER))),
		Male_60 = case(lower(M60_64) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M60_64) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M60_64))) +
case(lower(M65) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(M65) < 0 , 0, toInteger(M65))),
		Female_60 = case(lower(F60_64) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F60_64) < 0 ,0, toInteger(F60_64))) +
case(lower(F65) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(F65) < 0 , 0, toInteger(F65))),
		WhiteRace = case(lower(WHITE) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(WHITE) < 0 , -1, toInteger(WHITE))),
		WhiteAdult = case(lower(AW) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AW) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AW))),
		WhiteJuvenile = case(lower(JW) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JW) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JW))),
		BlackRace = case(lower(BLACK) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(BLACK) < 0 , -1, toInteger(BLACK))),
		BlackAdult = case(lower(AB) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AB) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AB))),
		BlackJuvenile = case(lower(JB) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JB) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JB))),
		AsianEthnicity = case(lower(ASIAN) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(ASIAN) < 0 , -1, toInteger(ASIAN))),
		AsianAdult = case(lower(AA) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AA) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AA))),
		AsianJuvenile = case(lower(JA) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JA) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JA))),
		NativeAmerican = case(lower(NATIVE) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(NATIVE) < 0 , -1, toInteger(NATIVE))),
		NativeAmericanAdult = case(lower(AN) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AN) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AN))),
		NativeAmericanJuvenile = case(lower(JN) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JN) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JN))),
		HispanicEthnicity = case(lower(HISPANIC) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(HISPANIC) < 0 , -1, toInteger(HISPANIC))),
		HispanicAdult = case(lower(AH) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AH) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AH))),
		HispanicJuvenile = case(lower(JH) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JH) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JH))),
		IsReported = $isReported,
		NonHispanicEthnicity = case(lower(NON_HISPANIC) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(NON_HISPANIC) < 0 , -1, toInteger(NON_HISPANIC))),
		NonHispanicAdult = case(lower(AN) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(AN) < 0 , -1, toInteger(AN))),
		NonHispanicJuvenile = case(lower(JN) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(JN) < 0 , -1, toInteger(JN))),
		TotalPopulation = case(lower(POP) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(POP) < 0 , -1, toInteger(POP))),
		STATENAME = upper(STATE)) ~> ConvertDataTypes
ConvertDataTypes, AreaData join(STATENAME == upper(AreaName),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AreaTableJoin
AreaTableJoin sink(input(
		Year as integer,
		AreaId as integer,
		AreaTypeId as integer,
		IsReported as boolean,
		Fips as integer,
		ORI7 as string,
		AllGenders as integer,
		Male as integer,
		Female as integer,
		AllGenders_0_17 as integer,
		Male_0_17 as integer,
		Female_0_17 as integer,
		AllGenders_18_24 as integer,
		Male_18_24 as integer,
		Female_18_24 as integer,
		AllGenders_25_39 as integer,
		Male_25_39 as integer,
		Female_25_39 as integer,
		AllGenders_40_59 as integer,
		Male_40_59 as integer,
		Female_40_59 as integer,
		AllGenders_60 as integer,
		Male_60 as integer,
		Female_60 as integer,
		White as integer,
		WhiteAdult as integer,
		WhiteJuvenile as integer,
		Black as integer,
		BlackAdult as integer,
		BlackJuvenile as integer,
		Asian as integer,
		AsianAdult as integer,
		AsianJuvenile as integer,
		NativeAmerican as integer,
		NativeAmericanAdult as integer,
		NativeAmericanJuvenile as integer,
		Hispanic as integer,
		HispanicAdult as integer,
		HispanicJuvenile as integer,
		NonHispanic as integer,
		NonHispanicAdult as integer,
		NonHispanicJuvenile as integer,
		TotalPopulation as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Year = YEAR,
		AreaId,
		AreaTypeId,
		IsReported,
		Fips = AreaData@Fips,
		AllGenders = ALLGENDERS,
		Male = MALE,
		Female = FEMALE,
		AllGenders_0_17,
		Male_0_17,
		Female_0_17,
		AllGenders_18_24,
		Male_18_24,
		Female_18_24,
		AllGenders_25_39,
		Male_25_39,
		Female_25_39,
		AllGenders_40_59,
		Male_40_59,
		Female_40_59,
		AllGenders_60,
		Male_60,
		Female_60,
		White = WhiteRace,
		WhiteAdult,
		WhiteJuvenile,
		Black = BlackRace,
		BlackAdult,
		BlackJuvenile,
		Asian = AsianEthnicity,
		AsianAdult,
		AsianJuvenile,
		NativeAmerican,
		NativeAmericanAdult,
		NativeAmericanJuvenile,
		Hispanic = HispanicEthnicity,
		HispanicAdult,
		HispanicJuvenile,
		NonHispanic = NonHispanicEthnicity,
		NonHispanicAdult,
		NonHispanicJuvenile,
		TotalPopulation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> updateDatabase
